00128         
00129         #define EPSILON 0.001
00130         inline bool sameGeometry(const RMapImage* mapImage) const {
00131             return fabs(x - mapImage->x) < EPSILON
00132                 && fabs(y - mapImage->y) < EPSILON
00133                 && fabs(theta - mapImage->theta) < EPSILON
00134                 && fabs(getRealWidth() - mapImage->getRealWidth()) < EPSILON
00135                 && image->getHeight() == mapImage->image->getHeight();
00136         }
